security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill with no executable code. SKILL.md only contains conceptual documentation describing a pre-sales lead intelligence system. No scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities present.

content.user_title: Find high-value leads in your inbox
content.value_statement: Manually scanning emails wastes time and misses opportunities. This skill automatically analyzes incoming emails to identify buying signals, score prospects, and rank opportunities so sales teams focus on the right leads first.
actual_capabilities: Extract sender company, role, and background from incoming emails
Detect buying signals and classify intent by tier (highest to low)
Cluster related emails into conversation threads for tracking
Score opportunities based on fit, intent, engagement, and timeline
Build relationship timelines showing prospect engagement journey
Enrich prospect data with company and professional context
limitations: Does not connect to email APIs directly (conceptual skill only)
Requires manual email input for analysis
No automated CRM sync in current version
No real-time email monitoring or notifications

use_cases.title: Prioritize daily outreach
use_cases.description: Rank incoming leads by opportunity score to focus on highest-potential prospects first each morning

use_cases.title: Identify hidden opportunities
use_cases.description: Detect buying signals in casual inquiries that appear low-intent but have high conversion potential

use_cases.title: Score lead quality
use_cases.description: Analyze email patterns to understand which campaigns generate qualified versus unqualified leads

prompt_templates.title: Check for new leads
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze these emails and identify any new prospects with buying signals. List them by opportunity score with their key details.

prompt_templates.title: Score a prospect
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze this email from [email]. Extract sender profile, detect buying signals, and provide an opportunity score with fit, intent, engagement, and timeline breakdowns.

prompt_templates.title: Build timeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a relationship timeline for [prospect] based on this email thread. Show engagement stages, when buying committee expanded, and predicted next steps.

prompt_templates.title: Rank opportunity pipeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze all recent emails and surface the top 5 opportunities ranked by composite score. For each, show the problem detected, timeline mentioned, and recommended next action.

output_examples.input: Analyze this email: 'Hi, we're struggling with our current project management tool and need something better. We have budget allocated for Q1 migration.'
output: Intent: HIGH - Budget allocated + specific timeline
Action: Call within 2 hours with migration case study

best_practices: Review opportunity scores each morning and contact Tier 1 leads within 2 hours
Track buying committee expansion as a key signal of serious purchase intent
Use timeline data to predict when prospects move to proposal phase
anti_patterns: Treating all emails equally instead of prioritizing by opportunity score
Waiting for explicit purchase language before engaging (early signals matter)
Ignoring slow-response prospects who may become high-intent buyers

faq.question: What email providers does this skill work with?
faq.answer: Conceptual skill works with Gmail, Outlook, and any email system that provides message access. No direct API connection required for basic analysis.

faq.question: What data does the skill extract from emails?
faq.answer: Sender name, email, company, role, location, phone, LinkedIn URL, intent signals, problem statements, and engagement metadata like response time.

faq.question: How accurate is opportunity scoring?
faq.answer: Scoring combines fit, intent, engagement, and timeline factors. Results are probability-based and improve with more conversation context.

faq.question: Is customer data processed securely?
faq.answer: The skill operates on email data you provide. No data is sent to external services beyond the AI model processing your input.

faq.question: Can this skill integrate with my CRM?
faq.answer: Current version does not sync with CRMs automatically. Future versions may support Salesforce and HubSpot integration.

faq.question: How is this different from standard email filters?
faq.answer: Filters only sort by rules. This skill understands context, detects buying intent, scores opportunities, and recommends specific actions.
